sentence.Network_en: Liz Davies took the issue to the party but was roundly defeated.
sentence.Network_cn: 利兹·戴维斯向政党提出了这个问题，但被断然否决了。

sentence.Network_en: Political leaders have roundly condemned the shooting.
sentence.Network_cn: 政治领袖强烈谴责了此次枪杀事件。

sentence.Network_en: The report has been roundly criticized.
sentence.Network_cn: 这份报告受到了广泛的批评。

list.abs: 叱_百度百科 ... ◎ 叱喝[ shout at] ◎ 叱骂[ curse;scold roundly] ◎ 叱问[ call sb. to account].
我在国安官论述了一句“梁言为老不尊”，就招来臭骂(Curse roundly)。我就不理睬了，人生最大的幸事是快乐。
Hoban roundly vetoed the idea ., 胡班断然否定了这一主意.
the chemical and physic as well asstructural changes in water caused by magnetization are fairly roundly expounded .较全面地阐述了磁化效应对水带来的物理、化学成分的变化。

entry.def: If you are roundly condemned or criticized, you are condemned or criticized forcefully or by many people. If you are roundly defeated, you are defeated completely.

example.ex: Political leaders have roundly condemned the shooting...
example.tran: 政治领袖强烈谴责了此次枪杀事件。

example.ex: Liz Davies took the issue to the party but was roundly defeated.
example.tran: 利兹·戴维斯向政党提出了这个问题，但被断然否决了。

auth_sentence.content: The international community has roundly condemned Thursday's coup.
auth_sentence.res_content: The international community has roundly condemned Thursday's coup.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The international community has roundly condemned Thursday's coup.

auth_sentence.content: But it has recently been roundly criticised.
auth_sentence.res_content: But it has recently been roundly criticised.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But it has recently been roundly criticised.

auth_sentence.content: Connie expostulated roundly, and was angry with both of them.
auth_sentence.res_content: Connie expostulated roundly, and was angry with both of them.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Connie expostulated roundly, and was angry with both of them.

sentences.en: He was roundly condemned for his mistake.
sentences.cn: 他因犯错而受到严厉指责。

sentences.en: I cursed her roundly for being late.
sentences.cn: 因为迟到，我狠狠地骂了她。

sentences.en: She abused him roundly for his neglect.
sentences.cn: 她严厉斥责他的疏忽行为。

sentences.en: The average works out roundly at 100.
